description:
Part A: Chio-chan wakes up earlier than usual and decides to walk through a park to get to school.
Part B: Chio-chan and Manana have fun talking about the upcoming physical fitness test.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L’effet papillon 2 / Les joies du kabaddi
ブラッディ・バタフライ・エフェクト② / カバディー・フォー
